name: Rogue Transmission
description: Rogue Transmission - Made in 48 hours (with < 24 hours work) for Global Game Jam 2018. Rogue souls like where the player has to complete tasks / puzzles in order to transmit the signal that opens the door in an endless dungeon with only one life. The players goal is to collect loot which is the only thing they can keep, enabling to improve their stats and progress further and further through the endless dungeon.
